messages.index.social.title: Welcome to Decentraland
messages.index.social.description: Create, explore and trade in the first-ever virtual world owned by its users.
messages.index.mobile_modal.description: Decentraland is currently only available via desktop. Enter your email to be notified as soon as we’re on mobile devices.
messages.index.main.title: Welcome to Bears
messages.index.main.description: Create, explore and trade in the first-ever virtual world owned by its users.
messages.index.explore.title: Explore
messages.index.explore.subtitle: Lose yourself in an amazing, evolving world
messages.index.explore.description: Explore LANDs owned by users to experience incredible scenes and structures. From a space adventure to a medieval dungeon maze to entire villages crafted from the minds of community members.
messages.index.create.title: Create
messages.index.create.subtitle: Test the limits of your imagination
messages.index.create.description: Create scenes, artworks, challenges and more, using the simple Builder tool, then take part in events to win prizes. For more experienced creators, the SDK provides the tools to fill the world with social games and applications.
messages.index.trade.title: Trade
messages.index.trade.subtitle: The virtual destination for digital assets
messages.index.trade.description: Buy and sell LAND, Estates, Avatar wearables and names in the Decentraland Marketplace: stocking the very best digital goods and paraphernalia backed by the ethereum blockchain.
messages.index.where_to_start.title: Can't decide where to start?
messages.index.dao.title: About Decentraland
messages.index.dao.subtitle: Determine the future of the virtual world
messages.index.dao.description: The first fully decentralized world, Decentraland is controlled via the DAO, which owns the most important smart contracts and assets of Decentraland. Via the DAO, you decide and vote on how the world works.
messages.index.blog.title: From the blog
messages.index.contact.title: Contact us
messages.index.contact.description: You’ll find us at all hours on Telegram. You can also reach us through the usual channels.
messages.index.subscribe.title: Get the latest updates
messages.index.subscribe.description: Breaking news on events, competitions and new developments in Decentraland, delivered straight to your inbox
